amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-29 to make technical, conforming, and clarifying changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Goodlatte.
